info.name: Facebook - Friend Finder [Remover]
info.description: Facebook - Friend Finder [Remover] will remove the Find Friends content on the left column where you should see the following: Best Friend, Coworkers and Classmates. This new style should also remove the ContextualHelp located on the right column where it some times say: Add a Picture of Yourself or even Welcome to Your Profile Get Inspired: See Friend's Profile. See other things you wish to see off your Facebook page? Just let me know!
